meanings.definition: A division or subdivision of a larger branch or organization.
meanings.sent1: The subbranch of the company handles customer service.
meanings.sent2: The bank opened a new subbranch in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The subbranch of the tree seemed to have a mind of its own, growing in a zigzag pattern.
meanings.sent4: In the family tree, the cousins are like subbranches, connected by the main trunk.
meanings.sent5: The subbranch of the river twisted and turned through the forest, creating a beautiful scene.

meanings.definition: A smaller or secondary branch of a main branch.
meanings.sent1: The subbranch of the tree had fewer leaves than the main branch.
meanings.sent2: The subbranch of the store specialized in organic products.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel leaped from the main branch to the subbranch, searching for nuts.
meanings.sent4: The subbranch of the family business focused on online sales, while the main branch handled in-store operations.
meanings.sent5: The subbranch of the river flowed gently, creating a peaceful atmosphere in the park.
